Articles.Content:
Hello, I've been making a Ship pack for about a week now and im finally "Done". i would like if you "Yes You!" reading this right now would download our pack and install it and tell us what you think. it'ill be updated frequently since i dont have anything else to do. If you get atleast 3 parts of it into space and connect them please send us a picture and post it to the thread .

For download click here -> http://www./?3a88065i6j72adw

Pack includes:

Space Station Core

Docking Docking arm

Escape Pods

Extender

Fuel Module

mRover ( Rover made by the Zerulian Team )

Power Module

Rover Arm ( Connect the rover to the spacestation )

Worker module ( Agile Worker Drone, Use for pushing, Connecting, Replacing, Relocating, etc.
I have just downloaded these space station modules and im about to try and get them into orbit and docked this will be my first space station/docking mission
Can you post some pictures thank you
these are not parts- they are craft files.
Then please put the post where it belongs.

So craft files do not deserve any pictures? How would I know what It'll look like then?

This is for additional parts and plugins mods.

Craft files belong on the Spacecraft Exchange (You still need pics)
